metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/
aws::graph::propositions: # Legal Proceedings and Regulatory Challenges Faced by Amazon
Amazon faces an increasing number and scale of legal proceedings as its businesses have expanded.
Amazon's legal proceedings have increased as its geographic reach has grown.
Amazon's legal proceedings have increased as its products have become more complex.
Amazon's legal proceedings have increased as its services have become more complex.
Amazon's legal proceedings have increased as its operations have become more complex.
Amazon's legal proceedings have increased as its products have become available to more people.
Amazon's legal proceedings have increased as its services have become used by more people.
Amazon's legal proceedings have increased as governments seek to regulate Amazon on a pre-emptive basis.
Amazon's legal proceedings have increased as regulatory authorities seek to regulate Amazon on a pre-emptive basis.
Amazon is litigating matters alleging price fixing claims.
Amazon is litigating matters alleging monopolization claims.
Amazon is litigating matters alleging consumer protection claims.
Some legal matters against Amazon are brought by state attorneys general.
Some legal matters against Amazon are brought by the Federal Trade Commission.
Legal proceedings can have an adverse effect on Amazon because of legal costs.
Legal proceedings can have an adverse effect on Amazon because of disruption of operations.
Legal proceedings can have an adverse effect on Amazon because of diversion of management resources.
Legal proceedings can have an adverse effect on Amazon because of negative publicity.
Legal proceedings can have an adverse effect on Amazon because of other factors.
The outcomes of Amazon's legal matters are inherently unpredictable.
The outcomes of Amazon's legal matters are subject to significant uncertainties.
Determining legal reserves from Amazon's matters involves judgment.
Determining possible losses from Amazon's matters involves judgment.
Legal reserves may not reflect the full range of uncertainties in Amazon's legal matters.
Legal reserves may not reflect the full range of unpredictable outcomes in Amazon's legal matters.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/
/FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/

text: The number and scale of these proceedings have increased over time as our businesses have expanded in scope and geographic reach, as our products, services, and operations have become more complex and available to, and used by, more people, and as governments and regulatory authorities seek to regulate us on a pre-emptive basis. For example, we are litigating a number of matters alleging price fixing, monopolization, and consumer protection claims, including those brought by state attorneys general and the Federal Trade Commission. Any of these types of proceedings can have an adverse effect on us because of legal costs, disruption of our operations, diversion of management resources, negative publicity, and other factors. The outcomes of these matters are inherently unpredictable and subject to significant uncertainties. Determining legal reserves or possible losses from such matters involves judgment and may not reflect the full range of uncertainties and unpredictable outcomes.
